pr_title: [JBPM-9321] Some form options can't be rendered in API response / DocumentCollection

timeline.message:
[JBPM-9321] Some form options can't be rendered in API response

Add DocumentCollection input

timeline.author: afalhambra

replies.bodyText: sorry, can't see the change yet?
replies.author: afalhambra

timeline.author: afalhambra

replies.bodyText: Same here, can't see the change yet
replies.author: afalhambra

timeline.author: afalhambra
afalhambra
afalhambra

replies.bodyText:
you setup this wrong. The type of the field should be org.jbpm.document.DocumentCollection
and it should be binded to a document collection. Otherwise it is not possible to make it work.
I am adding a instanceof check anyway.
replies.author: elguardian

timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.bodyText:
Worth checking not null

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                	<#if item.value?size gt 0>
          
          
            
                	<#if item.value?? && item.value?size gt 0>
timeline.author: afalhambra
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -70,6 +70,47 @@ +<#elseif item.type == "documentCollection"> +
+ +
+ <#if item.value?size gt 0>

replies.bodyText: it won't be never be null
replies.author: elguardian

timeline.bodyText: Should be browse upload Suggested change browser to download browse to upload
timeline.author: afalhambra
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -70,6 +70,47 @@ +<#elseif item.type == "documentCollection"> +
+ +
+ <#if item.value?size gt 0> + <#assign documents=item.value> + <#list documents as file> +
+ + + ${file.name} + + × +
+ +
+
+
+

Drop files here

+
+
+
+ <#else> +
+
+
+

+ Drag files here or + browser to download

timeline.bodyText: There is no javascript functionality linked to any onClick event to browse and upload files from your computer - only drag&drop works
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.message:
[JBPM-9321] Some form options can't be rendered in API response

Add DocumentCollection input

[JBPM-9321] Some form options can't be rendered in API response

Add DocumentCollection input

timeline.bodyText: It should match with what it is designed in BC - I mean, form is allowing to upload files not only by drag&drop but also using a file browse through an upload button.
